help-file.title: PAGING TOGGLE_PAGING
help-file.content:
Syntax: toggle paging
When this option is OFF, you will have the ability to scroll larger text files down your screen by hitting the enter key. When this option is ON, if the text being displayed is small enough or you have set your screen size large enough, you will be able to see the entire text in one continuous stream. You may set your screen size by using the "toggle screensize" option.
